entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Wreckhouse
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:18 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: WRECKHOUSE WIND WARNING , Wreckhouse
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:08 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wreckhouse 6:30 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023
Temperature: -3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa rising
Wind Chill: -10
Wind: W 22 km/h gust 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then becoming south 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain at times heavy or snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning then changing to rain at times heavy in the afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the morning. Fog patches developing near noon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming south 50 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 in the Wreckhouse area in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending overnight then cloudy. Fog patches. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 in the Wreckhouse area early in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023
